name: Porygon-Z
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error…

poke_power.name: Dimensional Transfer
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. This power can’t be used if Porygon-Z is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Suspicious Beam Beta
attacks.effect: If Porygon-Z has no Rainbow Energy attached to it, Porygon-Z does 20 damage to itself and Porygon-Z is now Confused.
